org.apache.flex.swf.tags

Class FrameLabelTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.swf.tags.Tag
      • org.apache.flex.swf.tags.FrameLabelTag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IManagedTag, ITag

    public class FrameLabelTag
extends Tag
implements IManagedTag
    Represents a FrameLabel tag in a SWF file.

    The FrameLabel tag gives the specified Name to the current frame. ActionGoToLabel uses this name to identify the frame.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Get the frame name.
        Returns:
        frame name

      • isNamedAnchorTag

        public boolean isNamedAnchorTag()
        In SWF files of version 6 or later, an extension to the FrameLabel tag called named anchors is available. A named anchor is a special kind of frame label that, in addition to labeling a frame for seeking using ActionGoToLabel, labels the frame for seeking using HTML anchor syntax.
        Returns:
        true if this FrameLabel is a named anchor tag.

      • setNamedAnchorTag

        public void setNamedAnchorTag(boolean value)
        Set if the this FrameLabel is an named anchor tag.

        In SWF files of version 6 or later, an extension to the FrameLabel tag called named anchors is available. A named anchor is a special kind of frame label that, in addition to labeling a frame for seeking using ActionGoToLabel, labels the frame for seeking using HTML anchor syntax.

        Parameters:
        value - is new namedAnchorTag
